name: CTFontStylisticClass
desc: The stylistic class values of the font.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a stylistic class structure with the specified raw value.

items.name: static var classOldStyleSerifs: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: A font style based on the Latin printing style of the 15th to 17th century.

items.name: static var classTransitionalSerifs: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: A font style based on the Latin printing style of the 18th to 19th century.

items.name: static var classModernSerifs: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: A font style based on the Latin printing style of the 20th century.

items.name: static var classClarendonSerifs: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: A font style variation of the Oldstyle Serifs and the Transitional Serifs.

items.name: static var classSlabSerifs: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: A font style characterized by serifs with a square transition between the strokes and the serifs (no brackets).

items.name: static var classFreeformSerifs: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: A font style that includes serifs but expresses a design freedom that doesn’t generally fit within the other serif design classifications.

items.name: static var classSansSerif: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: A font style that includes most basic letter forms (excluding Scripts and Ornamentals) that do not have serifs on the strokes.

items.name: static var classOrnamentals: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: A font style that includes highly decorated or stylized character shapes such as those typically used in headlines.

items.name: static var classScripts: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: A font style among those typefaces designed to simulate handwriting.

items.name: static var classSymbolic: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: A generally design-independent font style.

items.name: static var oldStyleSerifsClass: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: The font’s style is based on the Latin printing style of the 15th to 17th century.

items.name: static var transitionalSerifsClass: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: The font’s style is based on the Latin printing style of the 18th to 19th century.

items.name: static var modernSerifsClass: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: The font’s style is based on the Latin printing style of the 20th century.

items.name: static var clarendonSerifsClass: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: The font’s style is a variation of the Oldstyle Serifs and the Transitional Serifs.

items.name: static var slabSerifsClass: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: The font’s style is characterized by serifs with a square transition between the strokes and the serifs (no brackets).

items.name: static var freeformSerifsClass: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: The font’s style includes serifs but expresses a design freedom that doesn’t generally fit within the other serif design classifications.

items.name: static var sansSerifClass: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: The font’s style includes most basic letter forms (excluding Scripts and Ornamentals) that do not have serifs on the strokes.

items.name: static var ornamentalsClass: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: The font’s style includes highly decorated or stylized character shapes such as those typically used in headlines.

items.name: static var scriptsClass: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: The font’s style is among those typefaces designed to simulate handwriting.

items.name: static var symbolicClass: CTFontStylisticClass
items.desc: The font’s style is generally design independent.
